fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Rev Up- (Night) Gain 2000 RPM.
Cut The Slack!- (Day) [Cheat] Target a player who is two votes or fewer from being lynched. They are instantly lynched. Using this decreases your RPM by 5000.
Deadwood!- (Night) [Cheat] Target three players, hitting each with an Astral Overkill Attack. This decreases your RPM by 15000.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You have an RPM meter that starts at 5000. Certain things will increase and decrease this meter:
-If you are attacked, you will lose 4000 RPM per Attack level.
-If another Cog dies, you gain 2500 RPM.
-If you successfully kill a player, you gain 1000 RPM.
-If you are visited, you gain 1000 RPM per visit.
-You cannot die to night attacks unless you lose all your RPM.
